title: We’re All With You!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Shioriko-chan, our live is tomorrow, but are you prepared?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes, of course<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hmm…. Somehow I feel like you aren’t mentally prepared yet<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>No, I’m completely prepared on that front as well. I won’t let our preparations so far go to waste. I will show how much I’ve grown to everyone in the club and everyone in the audience as well<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>See, that’s what I’m saying. I used to think like that too when I first started. I tried to focus and lift my tension up all by myself, right, I felt like my relaxed body was slowly tensing up. Just as I thought I can’t do it anymore, I met Emma and Kanata, and they gave me their hardest pat on the back and a hug<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I think it’s important to focus and sort out your feelings, but you’re saying that’s bad….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>No, I’m saying that it’s something you should do in moderation. Shioriko-chan, you’ve been clenching your hand so much that it turned white. Let me see them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh, okay….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>They’re getting cold, huh. Emma-! Kanata-! Come here for a bit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh!? Umm….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, the three of us are going to help you get fully relaxed♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
